actionParams.description: The payemnt gateway for which to return the registration URL/s for the household. If omitted – return the regisration URL for the household for the default payment gateway
actionParams.name: alias

actionParams.description: Represent the client’s intent for working with the payment gateway. Intent options to be coordinated with the applicable payment gateway adapter.

actionParams.description: Additional parameters to send to the payment gateway adapter.
actionParams.name: extraParameters

description: Gets the Payment Gateway Configuration for the payment gateway identifier given
